data.actual_result: You can open the action sheet once again after it has been revoked, and you are given the options to revoke it again (which fails with a toast), to copy it and to share it with your friends
data.expected_result: The link should not be interactable at all after it has been revoked
data.short_description: Can still interact with an invite link after it has been revoked
data.steps_to_repro: - Create an invite link - Go to Server Settings > Invites - Tap the link to open action menu - Press Revoke and then tap immediately on the link again before it vanishes from the list
